channel.title: Very Small Preview of my Servers current state
channel.description:
[url=http://www.archive.org/download/Preview-Server/Film.wmv]http://www.archive.org/download/Preview-Server/Film.wmv[/url] High quality Movie whit high speed connection Filesize 34mb (opens in media-player)
The Npc speed is setted to fast so i could test for animation bugs
First Part - Some NPCs react to activety from around,for example people will yawn when bored and monks will pray. Second Part - Show realism of NPCs,thej use random attacks some attacks damage more then other attacks. Third Part - Showing the copy i made of the Lumby Bank Fourth Part - Runescape Drops and Critical Hits (the red cool stuff)

item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“1337kyle, post:2, topic:117151”]wow. looks amazing. keep working on it.[/quote]like i posted a week ago its gone be close to runescape whit new addons from members or from my own imagination

Read full topic
